attributes.action: Make anyone who works in a school among the first to receive the Covid vaccine.
attributes.additional_details: Because teachers support staff cooks ect have been neglected in this pandemic they have put there lives and there family's at risk to be there for other people children and have revived nothing extra for this risk giving them the vaccine first is the least we can do.
attributes.background: A simple request that anyone who works in a school to be included in the first people be offered the Covid vaccine school staff are on the front line everyday keeping children educated fed and safe and have there safety cast aside in this pandemic lets give them something back and get them all safe.
